properties.name: app.path.profile_images
properties.description: Directory in which profile images will be stored.

properties.name: user.security.max_unsucessful_tries
properties.description: Maximum number of unsuccessful tries after which the account will be locked.

properties.name: user.quota.none
properties.description: Maximum number of books that can be assigned to the role 'none'.

properties.name: user.quota.user
properties.description: Maximum number of books that can be assigned to the role 'user'.

properties.name: user.quota.librarian
properties.description: Maximum number of books that can be assigned to the role 'librarian'.

properties.name: user.quota.admin
properties.description: Maximum number of books that can be assigned to the role 'admin'.

properties.name: db.username
properties.description: Username to be used to make connection with the database.

properties.name: db.password
properties.description: Password of the username specified by the property 'db.username'.

properties.name: db.url
properties.description: URL of the database to get connection. Also set the properties 'db.username' and 'db.password' if required.

properties.name: db.driver_class
properties.description: Name of the class that will be used to make connection to the database with url set using the property 'db.url'.
